title: Classic Hangouts app removed from Google Play and App Store [U]
content:
In the coming weeks, Google Chat will replace classic Hangouts for Workspace customers. As part of this, Google said it would disable the old Hangouts mobile apps, and that looks to be underway with the iPhone app now removed from the App Store.

moreâ€¦

The post Classic Hangouts app removed from Google Play and App Store [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In the coming weeks, Google Chat will replace classic Hangouts for Workspace. Google Hangouts for iPhone is now gone from the App Store...
